au.gov.sbr.xml.wsse
Class WSSEVerifyKeySelector

java.lang.Object
  javax.xml.crypto.KeySelector
      au.gov.sbr.xml.wsse.WSSEVerifyKeySelector

public class WSSEVerifyKeySelector
extends javax.xml.crypto.KeySelector

A KeySelector which is used for selecting keys from X509 certs in WSSE digitally signed messages. It is used for TESTING ONLY. Do not try to use it in anger.

WSSEVerifyKeySelector

public WSSEVerifyKeySelector(java.security.cert.X509Certificate cert)
Constructs a newly allocated WSSE Verify Key Selector object.

Parameters:
cert - the X509 certificate with the RSA public key that is paired with the key parameter. Used to add an identifier to the signature.

                                          throws javax.xml.crypto.KeySelectorException
Selects and returns the keys from X509 certificates in WSSE digitally signed messages.

Specified by:
select in class javax.xml.crypto.KeySelector
Parameters:
